attributes.action: All children to get free solicitor until 18
attributes.additional_details: This will make sure police, schools, any other authorities give each child equal treatment, any incidents/accidents investigated thoroughly, will deter: cover ups, discrimination, paedophiles, being groomed, attacked/assaulted, etc.. The child itself as growing up will see justice is equal to all. (linked with e-petition 792). Also insurance companies might not cover nowadays, and hard to obtain solicitor.
